data.name: Graphic Designer
data.description: As a designer, you are a GENIUS. Your work is like black Saruman sorcery. When clients give you a blurry abomination of rainbow cassata ice cream of a requirement your job is to turn it into a beautiful image of gentle waves crashing into rocks during a majestic sunrise of web 2.0 lovemaking.

data.name: Project Manager
data.description: As a point of contact to your client, you are many things. You cannot be defined by one or two words. PM, Daddy, Dad, Papa, and Bald Mommy.To us, you are a superhero with many identities and you know better than anyone that mediating between clients and a tech team is akin to international diplomacy.

data.name: Business Developer
data.description: You can wrap potential clients around your little finger. You could convince Superman to give you his cape and negotiate peace between the Joker and Batman. You have your hands in many pies, multi-tasking is in your nature and you have an uncanny ability to interpret the needs of people even before they do.
